chapters.title: Chapter 54: The Sending
chapters.info: Bandry (Ban) Lewin, p. 679—Dannil Lewin's cousin. He looks jut like him except for a pickaxe nose and long thin mustaches in the Domani style. Note: in the paperback edition, this character is Tell Lewin, Dannil's brother. Either would make sense. See also Lewin, Dannil; Lewin, Tell.
